root.name: Madden NFL 09 All-Play
root.description: Madden NFL 09 All-Play is a simple version of Madden MFL 09 for the Wii. This version lets almost anyone play Madden without actually knowing any details on how to play the game. The controls are very simple and only use the Wii Remote. The player throws the ball like any other Madden yet the player runs by shaking the controller. The computer controls what direction the player runs in. The computer also controls the defense. This game is targeted at families with members that don't play many video games. Madden NFL 09 All-Play holds the player's hand through out the whole game.
